com.compendium.ui
Class DBUpdateListener

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.DBUpdateListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DBUpdateListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

This listener is registered with the dialog to update files in the database. It is to update the database from the temporary file system copy and to delete the copy when the user has finished editing.

Author:
rudolf

private  javax.swing.JOptionPane oDialog
          the dialog we are listening on

updateLinkedFile

private static boolean updateLinkedFile(LinkedFile linkedFile,
                                        java.io.File tmpCopy)
Update database with the contents of the temporary filesystem copy.

Parameters:
